title: Time series data exploration
description: OverviewThe goal of this kernel is data exploration of a time-series sales data of store items. The tools pandas, matplotlib  and, plotly  are used for slicing & dicing the data and visualizations. Note: There are some interesting insights waiting for you at the end of this notebook!
